price: یقینا زه (خبرې کوونکی) ستا رب یم نو وباسه خپلې څپلۍ یقینا ته د طوی په پاکه دره کې یې.
arabic: إِنِّيٓ أَنَا۠ رَبُّكَ فَٱخۡلَعۡ نَعۡلَيۡكَ إِنَّكَ بِٱلۡوَادِ ٱلۡمُقَدَّسِ طُوٗى

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: innī anā rabbuka fa-ikh'laʿ naʿlayka innaka bil-wādi al-muqadasi ṭuwan
